title: Leading 5 selling countries of IKEA products 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Sales share in the y axis.
The maximum Sales share 15.0 is found at Country Germany and the minimum is found at United Kingdom where Country is 6.0.
There is a difference of 9.0 between the maximum Country Germany and minimum Country United Kingdom.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Sales share for 5 number of Countrys.
Country Germany has the highest Sales share and United Kingdom has the lowest Sales share.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Sales share in the y axis.
The maximum Sales share 15.0 is found at Country Germany and the minimum is found at United Kingdom where Country is 6.0.
There is a difference of 9.0 between the maximum Country Germany and minimum Country United Kingdom.
max_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Sales share in each Country on the y axis.
Country Germany has the highest Sales share and United Kingdom has the lowest Sales share.
The highest Country Germany has 9.0 more Sales share than the lowest Country United Kingdom.
The Country Germany has the highest Sales share, followed by United States, and France. Down to the Country United Kingdom which is the lowest.
Similar Sales share is found in Country United Kingdom, and China.
The Country Germany tends to be 1.56 percent higher than average.
